column4: i put in the disc and then nothing happens, if i click on the cd to open it, there is an error message function disabled
i tried different types of cds
on my other pc it works
is there maybe a special version  of the boot cd for laptops ?
everything works on my pc but on my laptop it just doesnt boot
i burned the image correctly because it works on my home pc
can it boot from cd on your notebook? check your bios settings
and it isnt a dvd+r -r goof up or something like that? (on older notebook)
doesnt it boot at all? or does it boot the normal way?
icase it doesnt boot, does it post beep?
then it doesnt find the cd, check your BIOS settings agin
you can set directions on whats first on boot
